sentences.en: A plumber is a person who fits and mends the plumbing.
sentences.cn: 管子工是安装和修理水管的人.

sentences.en: A plumber's coming in to look at the boiler.
sentences.cn: 有位水暖工要来看看热水器.

sentences.en: At the age of 74, he is still going strong as the oldest plumber in business in Boise, Idaho.
sentences.cn: 尽管他已经74岁高龄，但身体依然很健壮，是爱达荷州博伊西商界中最老的水管工。

sentences.en: Dong is a plumber by trade.
Even without a high-school diploma, a black man can probably find a job if he looks. And some manual jobs, such as plumber or cable technician, pay quite well.
sentences.cn: 即便没有高中文凭，一个黑人只要有求职意愿，他仍可能找到工作，并且水管工和电缆维修员这类体力活，薪酬还挺不错。

sentences.en: Forty - five years as a plumber; I've earned my retirement, dreamed of this day for years.
sentences.cn: 干了45年的管子工, 退休是苦熬来的, 这一天盼了多少年了.

sentences.en: Have you asked the plumber to come and look at the leaking pipe?
sentences.cn: 你叫管道工来检查漏水的管子了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He must be a good plumber, or else he wouldn't be so busy.
sentences.cn: 他肯定是个不错的管子工，要不然他不会那么忙。

sentences.en: If It'still leaks, call a plumber.
sentences.cn: 如果它还漏, 就叫水管工来修理.

sentences.en: Not only is there no God, but try getting a plumber on weekends.
sentences.cn: 不仅上帝不存在，而且周末连一个水管工都找不到。

sentences.en: The plumber did a clean job.
sentences.cn: 这管道工人的活儿干得干净利落.

sentences.en: The plumber lost his kit on the way home.
sentences.cn: 这位水管工人在回家的路上把工具丢了。

sentences.en: The plumber screwed up the tap by means of a spanner.
sentences.cn: 管子工用板手把龙头旋紧.

sentences.en: The plumber took out a wrench and tightened the bolt.
sentences.cn: 管子工拿出一把扳手拧紧了螺栓.

sentences.en: The plumber's helper passes him tools.
sentences.cn: 水暖工的助手把工具递给他.

sentences.en: We had to call a plumber to unblock the drains.
sentences.cn: 我们得叫管工来通一通下水道.

sentences.en: We'll have to get a plumber in to mend that burst pipe.
sentences.cn: 我们得请管子工来修理那根爆裂的管子.

sentences.en: Well, if a pipe bursts, the house will call the plumber.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 如果管道破裂, 房屋会叫管道工人.

sentences.en: When the pipe leaked, we sent for a plumber.
sentences.cn: 煤气或水管漏了的时候, 我们就派人去找一位管子工.

words.tran_cn: 探究；垂直悬挂；用铅锤测量；灌铅以增重（plumb的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 管子工，水暖工，<美><口>（防止泄密的）堵漏人员
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to repair water pipes, baths, toilets etc
